text: EMI CD + DVD Best Collection: HOCC - The Greatest Hits (TC: EMI 視聽精選系列 - 最愛 何韻詩 (CD+DVD) (2006), SC: ) is a compilation released by Denise Ho's previous company. ==Songs== ===CD=== #露絲瑪莉 (RoseMary) #天使藍 (Angel Blue) #水花四濺 (Splashing Water) #勁愛你 (Love you Heaps) #我會選擇C (I would Pick "C") #Shampoo #沙 (Sand) #畸后 (Insane Queen) #元神出竅 (Soul Out) #迷你與我 (Mini and Me) #兄弟 (Brothers) #娃鬼回魂 (Ghost of a Ghost) #有得做 (Do-able) #一家之主 (Master of the House) #愛的教育 (Love's education) #未來 (Future) #我找到了 (I found it) #再見…露絲瑪莉 (Goodbye RoseMary) ===DVD=== ====Karaoke==== #迷你與我 (Mini and Me) #水花四濺 (Splashing Water) #Shampoo #沙 (Sand) #勁愛你 (Love you Heaps) (featuring Shine) #天使籃 (Angel Blue) #絕對 (Absolute) #我會選擇C (I would Pick "C") ====MV==== #元神出竅 (群星拱照版) (Soul Out) (Featuring various artists) #再見...露絲瑪莉 (Goodbye RoseMary) (Live) ==References== * Category:Denise Ho albums Category:2006 greatest hits albums Category:2006 video albums
title: Greatest Hits (Denise Ho album)
